p: In the case of Bufo bufo and Bufotes viridis, a species translocation can be firmly excluded in all the reported cases, based on the extensive knowledge of their natural geographic distributions ( Lanza, Nistri & Vanni, 2006; Sillero et al., 2014), as well as on the fossil data of both species in Europe ( Mart√≠n & Sanchiz, 2011).
